ORIGINAL TITLE: Adrift (Open Water 2)
YEAR:
2006
RUNNING TIME: 95 min.
COUNTRY: Germany
DIRECTOR: Hans Horn
SCREENWRITER: Adam Kreutner, David Mitchell
COMPOSER: Gerd Baumann
CINEMATOGRAPHER: Bernhard Jasper
CAST: Susan May Pratt, Richard Speight Jr., Eric Dane, Ali Hillis, Niklaus Lange, Cameron Richardson
STUDIO/PRODUCER: Universum Film / Orange Pictures
GENRE: Mystery / Drama
SYNOPSIS: A weekend cruise on a luxurious party yacht goes horribly wrong for a group of old high-school friends. They forget to let the ladder down before they jump into the ocean for a swim. The boat proves impossible to climb. They are stuck in the water many miles from shore, with baby Sara left alone on board. Sara&#039;s mother Amy must contend with her aqua-phobia as well as the group&#039;s increasing desperation, as the friends begin to turn on each other. Soon the exhaustion of keeping afloat and the struggle to get back on board begin to take a terrible toll. The happy reunion turns into a fight for survival...
